mapper.insert: insert into t_order (account, payType, carry, rebate, createdate, status, refundStatus, amount, fee, ptotal, quantity, paystatus, updateAmount, expressCode, expressName, otherRequirement, remark, expressNo, expressCompanyName, lowStocks, confirmSendProductRemark, closedComment, score, amountExchangeScore) values (#{account}, #{payType}, #{carry},#{ rebate}, #{createdate}, #{status}, #{refundStatus}, #{amount}, #{fee}, #{ptotal}, #{quantity}, #{paystatus}, #{updateAmount}, #{expressCode}, #{expressName}, #{otherRequirement}, #{remark}, #{expressNo}, #{expressCompanyName}, #{lowStocks}, #{confirmSendProductRemark}, #{closedComment}, #{score}, #{amountExchangeScore} )
